title.description: The title of the test (e.g., 'Derivatives and anti-derivatives').

set.description: Which set of tests this one belongs to (e.g., 'Homework', 'Practice Quiz').

number.description: The number of this test within the set (e.g., 1, 2, 3).

allowAccess.description: List of access rules for the test. Access is permitted if any access rule is satisfied.

items.description: An access rule that permits people to access this test. All restrictions in the rule must be satisfied for the rule to allow access.

mode.description: The server mode required for access.

role.description: The minimum user role required for access.

startDate.description: The earliest date on which access is permitted.

endDate.description: The latest date on which access is permitted.

options.description: Options that define how the test will work, specific to the individual test type.
